name: Simple Like Dislike Posts
author: Piyush Rawat

sections.description: The plugin provides option for users to add the function to display counter automatically before or after the content as well as to place them manually inside the single.php template file
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/simple-like-dislike-posts directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Like/Dislike Posts option on left sidebar to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Q. Can I palce this manually in template file?

A. Yes, you can paste <?php echo sal_showLikes(); ?> in your template file to display according to your needs.

Q. Can I allow only logged in users to LIKE/DISLIKE?

A. Yes, this option is available in the plugin page

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/simple-like-dislike-posts directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Like/Dislike Posts option on left sidebar to configure the plugin

short_description: Simple Like Dislike Posts provides user a seamless functionality to add LIKE/DISLIKE counter on thier posts.
description: The plugin provides option for users to add the function to display counter automatically before or after the content as well as to place them manually inside the single.php template file
